version_description:
• New Element: Group!

You can now group elements. To use it drag the "Group" element and then drag other elements on top of it. Reuse a set of elements without copying every single one of them, just copy and paste the whole Group. Put your elements into groups to make them easier to organize! Elements are positioned relative to the Group that holds them. You can also customize the Group element itself, change its background color, border style, and a lot more!

• New Keyboard command to open apps in the Apps Grid. (Cmd+O).
• Fixed bug that caused the Apps grid to show too close to the edges of the screen.
• Fixed multiple performance bugs in the element layers view.
• NEW: You can now test you app on iPhone and iPad without leaving Pineapple!

• NEW: The Drag & Drop canvas has been completely redesign to improve performance and make it much more easy and fun to use.
• NEW: You can now add Icons/Symbols to your app
• Fixed translation issues
• Fixed bugs and improved performance all around the app

• NEW: The Drag & Drop canvas has been completely redesign to improve performance and make it much more easy and fun to use.
• NEW: You can now add Icons/Symbols to your app
• Fixed translation issues
• Fixed bugs and improved performance all around the app
• Fixed a bug that caused screen actions to fail when the element was inside of a group.

• Xbox Adaptive Controller Support!
We want to make Pineapple available to everyone, that's why we are adding initial support for the Xbox Adaptive Controller in the canvas editor.

• VoiceOver Improvements
Designing with accessibility in mind is designing for everyone. This update features a lot of improvements in VoiceOver all around the app.

• New Action: Call
You can now add a new action that triggers a phone call to a specific phone number.

• New Action: Send Email
You can now add a new action that lets the user send an email to a specific list of recipients.

• New Action: Send SMS
You can now add a new action that lets the user send an SMS to a specific list of recipients.

•New Action: Open Website
You can now add a new action that lets the user open a website externally or within your app.

• New iOS 14 Photo Picker
You can now use the new Photo Picker when adding a logo or image to your app.

• New Customization: Password Text Input
You can now configure a Text Input as a secured Password Field.

• Bug Fixes & Performance Improvements

• Fixed a bug that stopped the app from modifying elements and saving changes after dismissing the Run interface.
• Fixed a bug that cause the edit menu to disappear in the canvas after editing some element attributes.
• Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements.
• Translation Improvements.

• You can now add a long pressure gesture to trigger your actions.
• New autosaving and manual saving features.
• Multiple Bug Fixes
• Performance Improvements
